item.title: Instagram and Facebook Manager for Aesthetic Clinic - Upwork
item.description:
We're seeking a talented Reels Creator to produce captivating short videos that showcase our treatments, highlight client transformations, and promote our special offers. If you have a passion for creating eye-catching content and know how to make it go viral, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities:
- Create engaging and high-quality Reels for our Instagram and Facebook pages.
- Highlight our aesthetic treatments, client transformations, and special promotions.
- Stay updated on the latest trends in short-form video content and incorporate them into our Reels.
- Collaborate with our team to ensure the content aligns with our brand and messaging.
- Edit and enhance video content to make it visually appealing and engaging.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 16:11 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Twitter Memes to YouTube Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

This should be very straightforward. I need a collection of memes from a Twitter/ X account, convert into a YouTube video. There are 110 tweets that are approximately 1 hour long total. I have a specific order I want to see. Below is an example of the memes as a video, however I need these in a different order.

https://youtu.be/6NeGfpoSS04?si=sr9Ooe7bDEIsMRFu
X Account @theroaringkitty tweets from the May 12th - May 17th.
The order I want is reverse order by time slot of the tweet. Starting at 5/17 at 4:00 PM, then 5/16 at 4:00PM, through 5/13 at 4:00PM. Then 5/17 at 3:45 PM. Then 5/16 at 3:45. And so on.

Thank you,
Mark


Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 16:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube, Video Editing, Twitter/X
Skills: YouTube, Video Editing, Twitter/X
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
I am looking for 5 top video creators who meet the following criteria. :)

- Voice over + very basic edit
- $2 per video
- Length of video: between 1 and 3 minutes.
- around 15-30 videos per week
- Example channel: https://www.youtube.com/@EasyAsThat

I'd love to hear examples of work you've done before.

item.title: Explainer Video about Semiconductor Industry - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video expert! I need to create an explainer video, whiteboard style, for our company launch. The video will explain the semiconductor industry, ecosystem and the role our company is going to play in it. The voiceover will be provided by our CEO. The video will be 5-10 minutes. We need someone that can understand the inputs, take a recording of what our CEO is trying to do and create amazing visuals to go with it. We are on a tight timeline and need this completed by July 1st. Please provide examples of your work so we can make a quick decision.

Budget: $300

item.title: Eye contact video - serious face (ideally in 4K quality) - Upwork
item.description:
I need people to film eye-practising videos of themselves. BE SERIOUS in video like you're having an important conversation with someone.

If your smartphone can film in 4K quality, this would be awesome

You'll basically have to film a video of yourself looking at the camera for 5 minutes

EASY WORK - $10 + 5 star review on Upwork

Become a part of the project that helps people get rid of social anxiety

***Details:
Video example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5w3cYtJekpw

- High-quality high-resolution video (need to have good smartphone or camera)
-     Film in daylight (don't film in evening, otherwise video quality will be bad)
- You shouldn’t be too far in video (only head and neck should be visible)
- Horizontal video
-      You should be STANDING (not sitting)
- Minimum 5 minutes long
- Camera should be stable and at eye level (not from below or above)
- DON'T SMILE, but blink naturally and make natural face expressions
- You can film indoors or outdoors
- Sounds on

Interested? Film a trial 15-20 seconds video to see if it looks good (send here or upload to google drive)

*****IMPORTANT: those who don't send trial videos will be rejected straight away


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 17, 2024 15:45 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Data Entry, Virtual Assistance
Skills: Data Entry, Virtual Assistance
Country: Lithuania
click to apply

item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor and animator with professional experience in editing and animating videos for YouTube. The ideal candidate should have a strong sense of storytelling and a good understanding of YouTube trends and audience preferences. You will be responsible for creating engaging visuals, adding special effects, and optimizing videos for YouTube. The ability to work with different video editing software and a creative mindset are essential for this role.

- Video editing

- Special effects

item.title: Video Production Specialist for Subway Accessibility and Instructional Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Production Specialist to create a series of Live - action accessibility and instructional videos (not animation) for public transit, specifically focusing on how to use the subway system. The goal of these videos is to provide clear and concise instructions to help individuals navigate the subway effectively. The specialist will be responsible for scripting, filming, editing, and producing high-quality videos.

  Key skills required:
  - Video production and editing
  - Scripting and storyboarding
  - Knowledge of public transportation systems
  - Ability to simplify complex concepts
  - Attention to detail

  Size: Large
  Duration: 1 to 6 months
  Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $6.00-$100.00

item.title: Ecommerce video editor - Well paid & Long term - Upwork
item.description:
Hello !

Our company is currently looking for an additional long-term Facebook Ads video editing expert.

We already have a multi-million dollar brand and are looking to recruit new talent to create quality video ads.

Your objective will be to assemble rushes, add text and create dynamic Facebook Ads. You'll receive full instructions on scripting, the order of rushes to be used and details to be taken into account from our creative strategist (who is already with the company).

You'll simply manage the editing to create compelling videos.

Your tasks will include:

- Editing according to the creative strategist's instructions
- Choose the most effective rushes to capture viewers' attention.
- Take into account feedback from the creative strategist.

It's really a collaborative effort between you and the creative strategist.

We'll provide you with ALL the instructions (via a complete and clear process) and content you need.

We're looking for an ambitious, long-term person who wants to develop within the company over the long term. If the work is good, you'll be very well paid.

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any further questions, and if you think you're THE person I and my team would like to work with.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 15:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Video Commercial, Facebook
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Video Commercial, Facebook
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400

item.title: [Maui, HI]: 90-second - 2-min promotional video featuring small business owner - [$500] - Upwork
item.description:
This short video (1:30 - 2:00 minutes in length) is for a small business that will be featured on Honeycomb Credit's investment platform. The business is raising investment capital through Honeycomb Credit and this video is critical in telling the story of the business and how they’re looking to grow. It will include a brief interview with the business owner (questions provided) as well as some b-roll within the location. We are also looking to receive 5-10 high-quality photos of the business owner and their products. This project features a local business.

Looking to schedule the shoot for sometime in the upcoming 2.5 weeks. We pay a $500 flat fee at the conclusion of the project. If this experience is beneficial for both parties, we would reach out with future job postings in the area.

Google Honeycomb Credit to check out our website!


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 17, 2024 15:25 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Promotional Video, MP4, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography
Skills: Promotional Video, MP4, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
